description: Number of figure 8's with 2n edges on the square lattice.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
S. G. Whittington and J. P. Valleau, Figure eights on the square lattice: enumeration and Monte Carlo estimation, J. Phys. A 3 (1970), 21-27.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
